free.chess
Class JChessClock

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              free.chess.AbstractChessClock
                  free.chess.JChessClock
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class JChessClock
extends AbstractChessClock

A Component for displaying a simple, text based chess clock. It also has the property of taking up as much space as it can, regardless of the set font size.

See Also:
Serialized Form
